author: P c upadhyay
text: There is undeclared load shedding regularly in Varanasi. If we total it will amount to at least 4 hours per day. Now for this period of not providing electricity, will the UPPCL reduce pro-rata, the amount of fixed charge in the electricity bill? This is justified.

author: P c upadhyay
text: Should this not be a point? https://t.co/1K8o8iAQMj

author: P c upadhyay
text: On train 14236 Bareilly Varanasi Express. It was late by 1 hr at Lko and is late 3 hr still it is kept waiting at Shivpur for last 30 m. Horrible railways.

author: P c upadhyay
text: Lko Bsb Intercity 14204 is usually late by 1.30 hrs though it starts right time. It's wilfully delayed by the controller. Inside truth. https://t.co/YEfof8qh6z

author: P c upadhyay
text:
It's very disappointing that trains are not managed properly. Often they are kept waiting on the outer signal or shabby small halt before the stations.
Right now Lko Bsb Intercity Express is stationed at Lohta for more than 30 minutes while it would have been at Varanasi by now.
